title: My Bootcamp Brings all the Nerds to the Yard: Lessons from GeekChic
summary:
My Bootcamp Brings all the Nerds to the Yard: Lessons from GeekChic

Tuesday 2 p.m.--2:45 p.m.

Audience level: Novice

Description

GeekChic Programming CEO & Founder, Josannah Keller, discusses best
practices and lessons learned from the all-female software training
program designed to give women the tools they need to become active
participants and leaders in the technology community. Abstract Ten-Hut!
The Bootcamp Model Benefits of coding schools The pitfalls (and how to
avoid them) Hiring junior developers

The Full Monty: Teaching full stack development with Python & Django
Best practices Lessons learned

Leaning In: How to start a (not so) new business in a new market The
technology of marketing Lessons learned

Women Transforming Technology: Where my ladies at?! Gender gap in
technology Benefits of diversity on a technical team Recruiting women
